text: Hi! I'm Marius, and I co-founded <url1>QED</url1>, a software company specializing in blockchain technologies based in <url2>Timisoara, Romania</url2>.
Outside of the tech world, I'm also the President of <url3>Viitorul Boxing Club</url3>, where I use my leadership skills to promote healthy behaviors and well-being in our community.

Apart from boxing, I'm passionate about learning. My worldview is influenced by the ideas of great thinkers such as <url4>Jean Baudrillard</url4>, <url5>Friedrich Hayek</url5>, and <url6>Richard Feynman</url6>.
